Props involving blades (knife) used in the scene.
High-complexity environment with multiple characters, vehicles, and actions.

script_text:
The ornithopter, unpiloted, settles to the desert floor.             
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                     7799..
description: The ornithopter, unpiloted, settles to the desert floor.
continuity_notes: ornithopter -> Matches Sc 24 Ornithopter:  | palm trees -> Matches Sc 37A Palm Trees: Ensure consistent color and texture | ornithopter -> N/A: unpiloted, settles to the desert floor.

script_text:
Jessica and Paul pick themselves up. On the horizon, many            
               miles off, they can see the Shield Wall that shelters                
               Arrakeen. Explosions flash above the wall.                           
                                                                                    
               She reaches under the diamond mark left by Yueh. Pulls out           
               the bundle under the seat: a compact, well-made BACKPACK.            
                                                                                    
               Jessica opens the pack. A little light illuminates inside.           
               Paul studies the contents.                                           
                                                                                    
                                   PAUL                                             
                         It’s a fremkit. Fremen survival                            
                         gear. It’ll give us a chance.                              
               Suddenly a HARSH VOICE squawks over the ornithopter’s                
               communicator: a guttural string of strange syllables.                
                                                                                    
                                   JESSICA                                          
                         Harkonnen battle language. They’re                         
                         demanding a counter-phrase.                                
                                                                                    
               The harsh voice speaks again. More demanding now.                    
                                                                                    
               Suddenly the displays of the cockpit avionics go red. Warning        
               labels with threatening symbols.                                     
                                   PAUL                                             
                         They’ve crippled the ship.                                 
                                                                                    
                                   JESSICA                                          
                         They’ll be on their way.                                   
                                                                                    
               They clamber out of the ornithopter.
description: Jessica and Paul pick themselves up after escaping from the Harkonnens, see the Shield Wall in the distance, and find a fremkit in the ornithopter's backpack.
continuity_notes: BACKPACK -> Matches Sc 48 Dr. Liety Kynes' Backpack (1): Use Scene 48 Backpack | FREMKIT -> Matches Sc 1 Fremen Survival Gear: Note the contents of the fremkit match the items in Scene 1 | ornithopter's avionics displays -> RED (WARNING): Avionics displays turned red with warning labels and threatening symbols | ornithopter -> CRIPPLED: The ship has been crippled by the Harkonnen battle language

flags.note: Combat and physical risks described (explosions, crippled ship)
Harkonnen battle language implies explosives or combat

script_text:
Paul and Jessica runs away from the ornithopter.                     
               They find themselves on a rise: in one direction, Arrakeen           
               burns, convulsed by war. In the other, a sea of dunes rolls          
               away to the horizon. They’re totally exposed. They press into        
               the dunes, barefoot in the sand in the dark. Paul lugs the           
               fremkit. The wind picks up, spice-dust swirling around their         
               feet. Paul and Jessica stare at the city on fire.
description: Paul and Jessica flee from the ornithopter and find themselves exposed in the sand dunes, watching Arrakeen burn.
continuity_notes: Ornithopter -> Sc 51 Ornithopter: Exact match from Reference Catalog | Fremkit -> Sc 90 Fremkit: Exact match from Reference Catalog | Dunes -> Sc 37A Palm Trees: Matches Sc 37 A Generic Greeneries and Dune | Spice-dust -> None: Missing item, should be logged as a gap in the harvester's work | ornithopter -> N/A: They run away from the ornithopter. | sand -> N/A: Paul and Jessica are barefoot in the sand in the dark. | fremkit -> Burned (inferred): The fremkit is being lugged by Paul.

flags.note: Paul and Jessica are exposed to wind and spice-dust, and they're also staring at the city on fire.
High-complexity environment due to weather effects (wind and spice-dust) and potential large crowds in Arrakeen.

script_text:
Baron Vladimir Harkonnen sits at the head of the table, under        
               the mounted bull’s head. He wears a Harkonnen uniform with           
               military trim for his day of triumph.                                
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                     8800..         
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
               Before him is laid a lavish dinner for one: a steaming roast,        
               cheese and wine. He eats the roast directly from the platter         
               with fork and carving knife, breathing like a buffalo.               
               Arrakis-born servants stand ready at either side, petrified.         
               Guards stand with their backs to the walls.                          
                                                                                    
                                   BARON HARKONNEN                                  
                             (with his mouth full)                                  
                         You have a good kitchen, cousin.                           
                                                                                    
               He directs his words to the far end of the table -- where            
               Duke Leto sits, naked, chained to a chair under the portrait         
               of his father. He is slumped over, still woozy from Yueh’s           
               drug: the Baron just a blur to him at the head of the table.         
               Outside the high windows, the night of Arrakeen is torn by           
               violence everywhere the eye touches. Columns of smoke rise           
               over the city, lit from below by lurid red flames.                   
                                                                                    
               Piter enters with Doctor Yueh. They stop beside the Baron.           
                                                                                    
                                   PITER                                            
                         Milord Baron. Doctor Yueh.                                 
                                                                                    
                                   BARON HARKONNEN                                  
                             (with his mouth full)                                  
                         The Traitor! What do you want?                             
                                   DOCTOR YUEH                                      
                         I jammed their comms and lowered                           
                         the shields. I delivered the Duke                          
                         and his family.                                            
                                                                                    
               He glances uneasily at the far end of the table, where Leto          
               stares at him glassily from beneath his tousled hair.                
                                                                                    
               The Baron squints at Doctor Yueh’s face, drawn and tragic.           
                                                                                    
                                   BARON HARKONNEN                                  
                         The bargain to the letter! And what                        
                         was I to do for you?                                       
                                   DOCTOR YUEH                                      
                         Deliver my Wanna from her agony.                           
                                                                                    
                                   BARON HARKONNEN                                  
                         Ah. Yes.                                                   
                                                                                    
               The Baron stabs his fork into the roast and rises, his feet          
               briefly leaving the floor as his suspensors overcompensate.          
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                     8811..         
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                   BARON HARKONNEN (CONT'D)                         
                         I said that I would set her free.                          
                         That you could join her.                                   
               He reaches out and takes Doctor Yueh by the hair. His grip           
               shockingly strong. Yueh gasps.                                       
                                                                                    
                                   BARON HARKONNEN (CONT'D)                         
                         So join her.                                               
                                                                                    
               He lifts the carving knife and SAWS OFF YUEH’S HEAD. So              
               brutally and swiftly that Yueh has no time to struggle. A            
               spray of blood spatters the servants, who dare not move.             
               The Baron shows Yueh’s head to Piter and lets it fall.               
                                                                                    
               He swings the knife slowly around, theatrically, to Leto.            
                                                                                    
               The Baron walks slowly down the long table with floating             
               strides, dragging the knife-point along the table.                   
                                                                                    
                                   BARON HARKONNEN (CONT'D)                         
                         What’s next?                                               
                                                                                    
               Leto lifts his head to stare at the Baron. Eyes focusing now.        
               There is death in his look. He is a chained lion.                    
               Instantly the Baron’s hand goes to his belt and activates his        
               shield. Piter giggles. Angry, the Baron prowls closer.               
                                                                                    
                                   BARON HARKONNEN (CONT'D)                         
                         For centuries we traded blood for                          
                         blood. But no more. Your son is                            
                         dead. Your concubine is dead.                              
                         Tonight House Atreides falls.                              
                         Your bloodline ends forever.                               
                                                                                    
               Leto lowers his head. Taking a moment for his grief and rage.        
               We see a brief mental image of Paul and then, one of Jessica.        
                                   LETO                                             
                             (under his breath)                                     
                         Here I am, here I remain.                                  
                                                                                    
               The Baron grabs Leto’s hair and drags his head up. The               
               carving knife at the ready. Leto takes a deep breath.                
                                                                                    
                                   BARON HARKONNEN                                  
                         What did you say?                                          
                                                                                    
               Muscles clench in Leto’s jaw. A tiny crunch. Leto opens his          
               mouth -- and blows out a cloud of poisonous vapor.                   
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                     8822..         
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
               The vapor is slowed by the Baron’s shield, revealing its             
               curving boundary. Penetrating only partially.                        
               The Baron leaps backward, retching and screaming. He slaps           
               his suspensor system into overdrive and shoots up to the             
               ceiling, tumbling head over heels.                                   
                                                                                    
               Below him the vapor spreads across the room with shocking            
               rapidity -- guards and servants falling dead in a wave from          
               one end of the hall to the other. Piter among them -- his            
               face twisting into a spectacular rictus.                             
                                                                                    
               More guards rush inside -- and fall dead in their turn.              
                                   HARKONNEN GUARD                                  
                         GAS!                                                       
                                                                                    
               The doors slam shut from the outside.
description: The Baron eats dinner while watching Duke Leto, who is chained to a chair. Doctor Yueh enters with Piter and tries to deliver his Wanna (Jessica) from her agony. The Baron kills Yueh and then turns his attention to Leto.
continuity_notes: roast -> Matches Sc 20a Roasted Meat (Table Setting):  | fork and carving knife -> Matches Sc 1 Dinning Utensils (Dining Table Setup):  | cheese and wine -> Matches Sc 20a Roasted Meat (Table Setting):  | bull's head mounted on wall -> Matches Sc 42a Trophy (Decorative Wall Hanging):  | Harkonnen uniform with military trim -> Matches Sc 42b Military Attire (Character Costume):  | servants' attire -> Matches Sc 81 Servant's Uniforms (Production Costume):  | guards' uniforms and equipment -> Matches Sc 81 Guards Uniforms (Production Costume) and Sc 28a Guard Equipment (Props):  | Duke Leto's nakedness, chained to a chair under his father's portrait -> Matches Sc 55b Duke's Imprisonment (Set Dressing) and Sc 78a Chained Prisoner (Props):  | Doctor Yueh's attire -> Matches Sc 9a Doctor's Attire (Character Costume):  | Piter's attire and giggle -> Matches Sc 78b Piter De Vries (Character Costume) and Sc 78c Piter's Giggle (Production Sound Effects):  | blood spatter on servants -> Matches Sc 38a Blood Stains (Props) and Sc 81 Servant's Uniforms (Production Costume):  | explosion in the room with fire, outside windows, and smoke columns -> Matches Sc 73 Explosion (Special Effects), Sc 87 Fire (Arrakeen Landing) (Visual Effects), and Sc 25 Smoke Columns (Visual Effects):  | Piter's face -> Bloody: Piter's face is twisted into a spectacular rictus | Baron Harkonnen's shield -> Overdriven: The Baron slaps his suspensor system into overdrive and shoots up to the ceiling

flags.note: Sawing off Dr. Yueh's head is a high-risk stunt that requires a Stunt Coordinator.
The carving knife and its use are considered props involving blades.

script_text:
Dim light filters through the tent walls as the sky brightens        
               outside. Sand hisses softly over the tent.                           
                                                                                    
               Paul unpacks the fremkit, taking inventory. Laying out items.        
                                   PAUL                                             
                         Sand compactor. Paracompass.                               
                         Thumper. “Maker hooks,” whatever                           
                         they are. The Manual of the Desert.                        
                         No stillsuits. The one thing we...                         
                                                                                    
               His breath catches. Beneath the manual there is a folded slip        
               of paper bound in a ribbon. Paul unfolds the paper. Inside he        
               finds a transmitter. The paper itself is a handwritten note          
               in elegant calligraphy.                                              
                                                                                    
                                   PAUL (CONT'D)                                    
                         This is Doctor Yueh’s handwriting.                         
                             (reading)                                              
                         “There is an Atreides transmitter                          
                         in the Fremkit. If anyone survives.                        
                         They’ll find you.”                                         
               Paul pulls it out -- and at the end of the ribbon dangles            
               Leto’s SIGNET RING.                                                  
                                                                                    
               They both stop breathing. Paul takes the ring off the ribbon         
               and hands it to Jessica. Heavy, ancient, obviously authentic.        
               It means death. They both know it. Tears shine in Jessica’s          
               eyes as she struggles for control. Her chin trembles.                
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                     8833..         
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
               Paul unfolds the paper. Inside he finds the compact edition          
               of the Orange Catholic Bible that Yueh gave him. The paper           
               itself is a handwritten note in elegant calligraphy.                 
               Jessica gives a short, sharp wail and covers her mouth.              
                                                                                    
               Paul watches the sand hissing over the tent, darkening the           
               interior as it covers the translucent fabric.                        
                                                                                    
               Jessica curls up and sobs. The love of her life gone forever.
synopsis: Paul finds a transmitter in the Fremkit
description: Paul discovers a transmitter in the Fremkit, which belonged to Doctor Yueh, and it contains a note with Leto's signet ring.
continuity_notes: Fremkit -> Sc 90 Fremkits: Matches Sc 90 Fremkits | Manual of the Desert -> Sc 1 Bibles/Books: Matches Sc 1 Bibles/Books | Thumper -> Sc 90 Thumpers: Matches Sc 90 Thumpers | Maker hooks -> Sc 1 Miscellaneous: Matches Sc 1 Miscellaneous | Transmitter -> Sc 90 Transmitters: Matches Sc 90 Transmitters | Stilluits -> Sc 80 Stilluits: Matches Sc 80 Stilluits, but missing from inventory | transmitter -> N/A: physically present in the Fremkit | paper -> N/A: contains Doctor Yueh's handwriting and a transmitter | ribbon -> N/A: bound around the paper, holding the transmitter and signet ring in place | signet ring (Leto’s) -> Authentic: dangling from the end of the ribbon, attached to a transmitter and a paper with a handwritten note | paper -> N/A: contains a compact edition of the Orange Catholic Bible in elegant calligraphy

flags.note: High-complexity environment: sandstorm outside the tent.
Atreides transmitter and possibly other equipment could be related to weaponry.

script_text:
Duke Leto Atreides lies back in the chair, eyes open, looking        
               at eternity. A white dust covering him and his surroundings.         
                                                                                    
               Around him, an apocalyptic sight: dozens of bodies scattered         
               across the floor, frozen in contorted positions like the dead        
               of Pompeii. Amongst them, Piter de Vries.                            
                                                                                    
               Harkonnen guards enter the hall in sealed spacesuits --              
               wheeling a filtration device to purge the air of poison.             
                                                                                    
               A sinister sound -- like ice breaking up on a lake in winter.        
               The soldiers look up.                                                
               The Baron’s massive body is glued to the high ceiling, curled        
               up like a gigantic dead spider. Suddenly it begins to move,          
               crawling monstrously down the wall.                                  
                                                                                    
               The soldiers step back in superstitious dread. The Baron, his        
               face hidden under his cloak, crawls out of the room. The             
               soldiers exchange terrified looks.
description: Duke Leto lies in a chair covered in white dust, surrounded by bodies and Harkonnen guards enter with a filtration device.
continuity_notes: Baron Harkonnen's body -> Sc 42AD Baron Harkonnen: Use Sc 42AD's prop and costuming | Filtration device -> Matches Sc 1 Spacesuits: Use scene 1 spacesuit props | Ice breaking sound effect -> Matches Sc 73 Massive body crawling: Use Sc 73's FX and audio | Chair -> N/A: Duke Leto Atreides lies back in the chair, eyes open, looking at eternity. | Bodies on floor -> Multiple bodies scattered across the floor, frozen in contorted positions like the dead of Pompeii.: State change: Multiple bodies | Piter de Vries' body -> Amongst them, Piter de Vries.: State change: Broken (implied by contorted position) | Filtration device -> Harkonnen guards enter the hall in sealed spacesuits -- wheeling a filtration device to purge the air of poison.: State change: Moving | The Baron's massive body -> The Baron’s massive body is glued to the high ceiling, curled up like a gigantic dead spider. Suddenly it begins to move, crawling monstrously down the wall.: State change: Moving | High ceiling -> The Baron’s massive body is glued to the high ceiling, curled up like a gigantic dead spider.: State change: Attached something (glued)

flags.note: CRAWLING stunt and superstitious dread from soldiers indicate physical risks.

script_text:
The windblown sand covers the last of the tent’s exposed             
               surface, concealing it completely. The sand keeps coming.
description: The wind blows sand over the stilltent, covering it.
continuity_notes: tent -> Matches Sc 1 Duffel Bags: Use Scene 1 Tent | sand -> Matches Sc 2B Sandbags: Note color, texture and quantity | tent -> exposed surface concealed by windblown sand: Physical state change: Concealed completely | sand -> still coming: Production instruction: Continues to fall

script_text:
PAUL SNAPS BACK TO REALITY.                                          
                                                                                    
               He shakes his head in bewilderment.                                  
                                                                                    
                                   PAUL (V.O.)                                      
                         My father is dead. Why can’t I cry?                        
               He closes his eyes as spice visions shake him, like a drug           
               altering his awareness.                                              
                                                                                    
               He glares at her with cold intensity. Jessica is shocked by          
               this turn in him. His coldness.                                      
                                                                                    
                                   JESSICA                                          
                         Paul...                                                    
                                                                                    
                                   PAUL                                             
                         There’s something awakening in my                          
                         mind.                                                      
               He sounds half-mad. Jessica recoils, afraid of the visionary         
               light in his eyes. Afraid of what he sees.                           
                                                                                    
               She looks at him closely. He’s trembling. His eyes far away.         
                                                                                    
                                   JESSICA                                          
                         You’re afraid. What do you see that                        
                         you fear?                                                  
                                                                                    
                                   PAUL                                             
                             (in a rising frenzy)                                   
                         Holy war. Spreading across the                             
                         universe like unquenchable fire.                           
                         A warrior religion that waves the                          
                         Atreides banner. Fanatical legions                         
                         worshipping at the shrine of my                            
                         father’s skull. A crusade. In my                           
                         name. My name. That’s the future.                          
                         It’s coming.                                               
                                   JESSICA                                          
                         Paul.                                                      
                                                                                    
                                   CHANI’S VISION                                   
                         Paul!                                                      
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                 SSaallmmoonn RReevv.. ((0066//1199//22002200)) 8866..
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
               She grabs him by the shoulders. Anchoring him.                       
                                   JESSICA                                          
                         Your name is Paul. Paul Atreides.                          
                         You are the Duke Paul Atreides.                            
                                                                                    
               He looks up his eyes are shining with tears.                         
                                                                                    
                                   PAUL                                             
                             (using the Voice)                                      
                         GET OFF ME!                                                
                                                                                    
               Jessica moves back.                                                  
                                   PAUL (CONT'D)                                    
                         You did this to me! You BENE                               
                         GESSERIT. You made me a freak!                     *       
                                                                                    
               Jessica slowly goes back closer to him. She pulls him into           
               her shoulder, holding him. He bursts into sobs, finally. She         
               cries with him.
description: Paul snaps back to reality and is overwhelmed by visions of his father's death and a future war.
continuity_notes: Paul's clothes -> Sc 48 Linen Dress: Matches Sc 95B Linen Dress | Doctor Yeh's medical equipment -> Sc 55 Doctor Yeh's Medical Equipment: Use Scene 55 medical equipment | Worm sign (harvester on caterpillar tracks) -> Sc 51 Wormsign (Massive) - Harvester on Caterpillar Tracks: Matches Sc 51 Wormsign description | Chain -> Sc 94 Chain: Use Scene 94 Chain | Chair -> Sc 96 Chair (White Dust): Matches Sc 96 White Dust description, including chair

flags.note: Paul is experiencing a vision of combat and war, which may involve physical risks.
The scene involves intense emotional moments, including Paul's breakdown and crying with Jessica.

script_text:
An army of Fremen are cheering at their leader who’s standing        
               in the opened door of a spacecraft, hovering above the               
               soldiers.                                                            
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
                                  GGoollddeenn RReevv.. ((0066//1122//2200)) 8855.. 
                                                                                    
                                                                                    
               We get closer and see that the dark leader figure is Paul,           
               flanked by Chani and other soldiers.                                 
               CLOSER LOOK AT Paul, dark and silent.
description: Paul arrives in a spacecraft with his Fremen army, cheered on by the crowd.
continuity_notes: Spacecraft -> Matches Sc 5 Shuttle: Use Scene 5 Shuttle specifications for this scene. | Soldiers -> Matches Sc 27 Troop Carriers: Use Scene 27 Troop Carrier specifications for the soldiers' uniforms and equipment. | Fremen Leader (Paul) -> No match, ignore due to 'NO-PEOPLE' rule:  | Dark leader figure's attire -> Matches Sc 33 Thufir Hawat's uniform: Use Scene 33 Thufir Hawat's uniform specifications for Paul's attire. | Landing site (Arrakeen) -> Matches Sc 91 Sand Dunes: Verify that the landing site is consistent with Scene 91 Sand Dunes.
